mission: Marvel Comics explosion! Benjamin Netanyahu with lightning effects crashes through Knesset walls. CRASH! 'I am eternal!' Opposition parties vanish in comic smoke. WHOOSH! Coalition deals with exploding panels. BOOM! Juggling multiple corruption trials while texting. ZAP! Building settlements with energy beams. THWACK! Judicial reform controversy splits the nation. CRACK! 'Bibi will return... again!' WHAM! Israeli flag with lightning bolts.

script_processing.original_script: [VISUAL: Benjamin Netanyahu with lightning effects crashes through Knesset walls. CRASH!] DIALOGUE: Behold! I am eternal! [VISUAL: Opposition parties vanish in comic smoke. WHOOSH!] DIALOGUE: The opposition has vanished in comic smoke. [VISUAL: Coalition deals with exploding panels. BOOM! Juggling multiple corruption trials while texting. ZAP!] DIALOGUE: Coalition deals explode; trials are juggled, and settlements are built. [VISUAL: Judicial reform controversy splits the nation. CRACK!] DIALOGUE: Judicial reform's controversy splits the nation asunder. [VISUAL: Israeli flag with lightning bolts. WHAM!] DIALOGUE: Bibi will return again! Truly, he will return.
script_processing.final_script: Behold! I am eternal. The opposition has vanished. Coalition deals exploded; trials were juggled. Settlements were hastily built. Judicial reform's controversy deeply divided the nation. Bibi will return. His return is inevitable. The people await his leadership. His legacy is secure. He is a force of nature. He will not be silenced. The future is his
